name: Middle East Airlines Training & Conferences Center
about: The Middle East Airlines Training & Conferences Center, located in Beirut, is a premier aviation training facility serving the Middle East and beyond. It offers specialized training for pilots, cadets, cabin crew, technical aircraft maintenance, ground, operations, and administrative staff, adhering to local and international regulations. The center features state-of-the-art facilities, including an Airbus A320 Full Flight Simulator, cabin emergency evacuation trainers, and extensive computer-based training stations. It also hosts conferences and provides training in various aviation disciplines, contributing to Lebanon's role as a regional hub for aviation education and culture. With a commitment to excellence, professionalism, and continuous improvement, the center ensures high-quality training and a supportive environment for its valued employees.
services:
["Pilots and Cadets Training
Cabin Crew Training
Technical Aircraft Maintenance
Ground and Administrative Crew Training"]
